original_text: And one said to the man clothed in linen, which was upon the waters of the river, How long shall it be to the end of these wonders?
korean_text: 그 중에 하나가 세마포 옷을 입은 자 곧 강물 위쪽에 있는 자에게 이르되 이 놀라운 일의 끝이 어느 때까지냐 하더라

sentences.original_text: And one said to the man clothed in linen,
sentences.korean_translation: 한 사람이 삼베옷을 입은 사람에게 말하기를,

sentences.original_text: which was upon the waters of the river,
to the end of these wonders?
